name: Homemade Pizza
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups (355 ml) warm water (105 F- 155 F)
1 package (2 1/4 teaspoons) of active dry yeast
feta cheez, firm mozzarella cheez, grated
instructions: Palce the warm water in the large bowl of a heavy duty stand mixer. Spinkle the yeat over the warm water and let it sit for 5 minutes until the yeast is dissolved.
Add the flour, salt, sugar, and olive, and using the mixing paddle attachment, mix on low speed for a minute. the replace the mixing paddle with the dough hook attachment.
Spread a thin layer of olive oil over the inside of a large bowl. place the pizza dough in the bowl and turn it around so that it gets coated with the oil.
